body_html:
Yeah, this doesn't seem to be available in the current version. As a temporal workaround, I put 1zb's version on a python file, from which you can import Conv2dLocal. I tested it and it works.

Here it is: https://gist.github.com/guillefix/23bff068bdc457649b81027942873ce5

body:
Yeah, this doesn't seem to be available in the current version. As a temporal workaround, I put 1zb's version on a python file, from which you can import `Conv2dLocal`. I tested it and it works.

Here it is: https://gist.github.com/guillefix/23bff068bdc457649b81027942873ce5
